verbose_text: XREF_TABLE summarizes the literature on the dependence of equilibrium transcytolemmal water exchange kinetics (tau i -1) on driving membrane P-type ATPase ion pump gene dosage, substrate concentration, and specific inhibitor concentration in yeast suspension, perfused rat heart, and erythrocyte suspension studies.
